name: Fotspor
description:
Fotspor is a infiltration puzzle game in third person
Knut, illegitimate king of Bokmal, stole the Fotspor and proclaimed himself ruler of the city.
The player embodies Harald the viking, exiled from is native village, Bokmal, cause of his sacred mark making him the legitimate king of this place.
His goal is to do everything possible to take back the Fotspor, the electronic chip containing the consciousness of Ragnar (the mythical king who created the Fotspor), to regain his place on the throne.
To do this the player have to hack the security system of Knut and infiltrate in the districts of Knut.
